Detailed Description

Author:
Elliot Chance

Member Function Documentation

readFile ( $  uri,
$  a = false 
)

Open and prepare a file for reading.

When this method is used with CMFileReader it will usually load the entire single entity file, however if readFile() is used with CMFileMultiReader is will usually simply open and prepare the file handle ready for readNext().

Parameters:
$uri Location of the file to read.
$a An associative array of extra attributes and options. See inherited class for specific details.
Returns:
true on success, otherwise false.

Implemented in CMFileCSV, CMFileICAL, and CMFileVCF.

readString ( $  str,
$  a = false 
)

Open and prepare a string for reading.

This method should work in exactly the same way as readFile() except that the input stream is a string rather than a file.

Parameters:
$str String stream.
$a An associative array of extra attributes and options. See inherited class for specific details.
Returns:
true on success, otherwise false.

Implemented in CMFileCSV, CMFileICAL, and CMFileVCF.
